alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln, northern Oklahoma and southeastern Logan Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 328 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from the north side of Edmond to 8 miles north of downtown Oklahoma City. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Guthrie, The Village, Nichols Hills, Langston, Luther, Carney, Tryon, Coyle, Arcadia, Meridian, Fallis, Lake Aluma and Downtown Edmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
